message: Let's start fair, I take most of the money but you get a small share to start.  We can work on a better split as we go.
That's a pretty uneven split Alice.  I'm proposing we go 60/40, it's a good starting point for negotiation.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise.
The clock is ticking, Alice.  Let's be reasonable - I'll take the same cut you just offered me.
